General.Name: Nanya Technology Corp
General.Description: Nanya Technology Corporation researches, develops, manufactures, and sells semiconductor products in Taiwan, Japan, China, the United States, and internationally. It offers standard dynamic random access memory (DRAM), low power DRAM, MCP and eMCP, and KGD products, as well as modules; and other memory products. The company also engages in the import and export of its machinery, equipment, and raw materials. Its products have applications in home and entertainment, office and enterprise, smartphones, portable, data centers, industrial, consumer electronics, servers, personal computers, and automotive. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 98, Nanlin Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 243
